name: Vehicle Stunt Simulator VR
description:
Hop in a JDM nissan car and experience thrill of racing and stunting in VR. Put on a VR headset and control cars from comfort of your keyboard and mouse or a gamepad.

This game works in VR and non VR also works with VR devices where your phone screen is used as display like Google VR cardboard.
Cars are controlled through keyboard  and mouse for best user experience and gamepad controllers too.
